sentences.en: But Jason showed that he was able to conquer his fears.
sentences.cn: 但是詹森说他能够战胜恐惧.

sentences.en: Egypt was conquered by the Persian king Kambyses.
sentences.cn: 埃及被波斯国王冈比西斯征服。

sentences.en: Einstein lived not to conquer or destroy, but to understand.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦活在世上不是为了征服或破坏什么, 而是为了理解这个世界.

sentences.en: Garland tried to appear casual, but he couldn't conquer his unease.
sentences.cn: 加兰努力装出无所谓的样子，可是他没法克服自己的局促不安。

sentences.en: He is having therapy to conquer his phobia.
sentences.cn: 他在接受治疗以克服自己的恐惧症。

sentences.en: How can I conquer my disinclination to meet people?
sentences.cn: 我怎样才能克服不愿与人交往 呢 ?

sentences.en: I was certain that love was quite enough to conquer our differences.
sentences.cn: 我相信爱足以克服我们的种种差异。

sentences.en: Love casts out fear, and gratitude can conquer pride.
sentences.cn: 爱驱散了恐惧, 感激则能征服傲慢.

sentences.en: Our purpose is not only to conquer nature but also to remake nature.
sentences.cn: 我们的目的不仅要征服自然,而且还要改造自然.

sentences.en: Sennacherib's grandson Assurbanipal did actually conquer Egypt in 670 BC.
sentences.cn: 塞纳克里布的孙子亚瑟巴尼帕尔确实在公元前670年攻克埃及.
诺曼人于 1066 年征服英格兰。

sentences.en: The Zulus conquered all the neighbouring tribes.
sentences.cn: 祖鲁人打败了所有相邻的部落。

sentences.en: There is always one thing to conquer [ overcome ] another .
They became overheated nationalists, militarists, and they were out to conquer.
sentences.cn: 他们变成了过分狂热的民族主义分子和军国主义分子，并想要征服别国。

sentences.en: They feared that totalitarians might yet conquer the entire world.
sentences.cn: 他们担心极权主义者会征服整个世界。

sentences.en: They learned that even in times of war, love can conquer all.
sentences.cn: 他们学到了即便在战争时期, 爱仍能战胜一切.

sentences.en: When will scientists conquer the stars?
sentences.cn: 科学家什么时候能征服恒星 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: to get control of a country by fighting

trans.tran_cn: 征服， 战胜； 破除， 克服
trans.tran_en: to get control of a country by fighting
